data.title: 'Love is Blind' Season 5 reunion special: Release date, how to watch
data.text:
Season 5 of "Love is Blind" has come and gone, and now it's time to reunite the cast to recap the events of the season.

The reunion special is set to air on Netflix this weekend, the company said in a news release, and will "reunite the cast for the first time since the mid-season breakups, 'I Dos' or 'I Don'ts.'"

According to the release, the cast will "reflect on their past relationships, break down this season's twists and turns, and unveil secrets that have unfolded since the experiment concluded."

The show centers around singles who "want to be loved for who they are," as Netflix says. They contestants signed up for a "less conventional approach to modern dating," as they choose someone to marry without ever meeting them.

The group of singles that participated in Season 5 includes a geoscientist, veterinarian, flight attendant and a personal trainer.

Here's what you need to know about the "Love is Blind" reunion special, including how to watch.

'Love Is Blind' Season 5 Finale: Release date, how to watch final episode

'Love is Blind" Season 5 reunion special release date

The reunion special is scheduled to premiere at 8 p.m. ET on Sunday, Oct. 15. The episode will air exclusively on Netflix.

'Love is Blind' Season 5 reunion teaser

Netflix released a video announcing the reunion special on Oct. 10. And no, it will not be live this time.

Who is hosting the 'Love is Blind' Season 5 reunion special?

The reunion is hosted by Nick and Vanessa Lachey.
